registerToSee: Register to see Centime in action.
defaultSignupSubtitle: Explore the only all-in-one cash management solution for AP, AR, cash flow forecasting, and more. With Centime, you can:
defaultSignupText1: Get paid faster with automated Accounts Receivable.
defaultSignupText2: Take the pain out of payables with automated Accounts Payable.
defaultSignupText3: Strategically plan and manage inflows and outflows with Cash Flow Forecasting.
defaultSignupText4: Secure working capital lines of credit with CentimeCredit.
defaultSignupText5: Get actionable insights to help you optimize working capital with advanced monitoring and KPI reporting.
defaultSignupBottomTitle: Free to try. No credit card required.
signUpLeftSideSubTitle: Please create your profile to explore Centime's entire cash management suite
secureSignupTitle: Get started with CentimeSecure today and start diversifying deposits and managing risk without compromising on convenience, liquidity, or yield.
secureSignupText1: Diversify your deposits across multiple FDIC insured accounts.
secureSignupText2: Maximize yield, with interest rates up to 40x the average.
secureSignupText3: Keep cash liquid, and easily transfer between accounts.
secureSignupBottom: Free signup. No cost to you, and no credit card required.
quickBooksSignupTitle: Centime integrates seamlessly with QuickBooks and enables you to:
actionMsg: Submit your application in 3 easy steps
guidelinesMsg: Fill in the required information in each step to submit your CentimeSecure application successfully
